nodes.text: During the Imperial Era, the Galactic Empire operated a deepdock at Ryloth, a planet located in the Ryloth system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Gaulus sector. The Imperial Navy's Venator-class Star Destroyer Electrum was stationed at the deepdock; however, by 14 BBY, the Star Destroyer had been loaned out to serve in the flotilla of the Imperial facility known as Sentinel Base.
The deepdock was mentioned in the novel Tarkin, which was written by James Luceno and released in 2014.
